mean_cn: n.清教徒，极端拘谨的人；  adj.清教徒的
mean_en: a group of English Protestants in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries who lived in a very strict and religious way.
sentence: Puritan women would often pray to God to save them from impure thoughts.
sentence_trans: 女性清教徒经常祈求上帝将她们从不纯洁的思想中拯救出来。
word_etyma: Pur纯洁+it表人+an表示人→Puritan讲究道德纯洁之人
